location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire to Lieutenant Henry Willock, Second Assistant to HM Mission to Persia

mods.abstract: The letter acknowledges the receipt of a copy of a communication sent by Sir Harford Jones [Brydges] to Lieutenant Henry Willock. The letter further notes that William Bruce will supply any services required to facilitate the goals of HM Persian Mission.
